description: Even numbers in the sequence generated by a(n) = a(a(n-3)) + a(n-a(n-3)).
links: Matthew House, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[1]=1; a[2]=1; a[3]=1; a[n_]:= a[n] = a[a[n-3]] + a[n-a[n-3]]; Select[ Array[a, 200], EvenQ] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Jul 28 2015 *)
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
